name: div
features: Protective: Official sliding mitt of the MLB, designed to protect hands & fingers from jams & sprains during steals and slides
Reversible Design: Can be worn on either the left or right hand for versatile protection
Responsive Feel: Lightweight, soft-shell material allows baserunners to maintain finger mobility for grabbing the bag
Secure Wrist Wrap: Reinforced wrist strap ensures a snug fit & provides added wrist stability
Impact Resistant: Engineered & tested for maximum impact dispersion to deliver confidence & safety on the basepaths
